Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model.Board

Class Field

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model.Board.Field
public class Field extends Object
This class contains the board data of each player. The class allows to place cards, to calculate points, and manage to calculate the points of a placed card

  • Constructor Details

    • Field

      public Field(StarterCard starter)
      This is the constructor method that initializes the Field class. It needs a starting card and based on its parameters update the visibleElements data
      Parameters:
      starter - The starting card needed to start a match

  • Method Details

    • tryPlaceCard

      public int tryPlaceCard(ResourceCard card, Coords coords) throws NotPlaceableException, NoPossiblePlacement
      This method is exposed to allow the placing (or not) of Resource card
      Parameters:
      card - This parameter contain a ResourceCard that will be placed if the coordinates chosen by the player are correct
      coords - This parameter contain the Coordinates chosen by the player to place the card
      Returns:
      the points given by the card placed
      Throws:
      NotPlaceableException
      NoPossiblePlacement

    • tryPlaceCard

      public int tryPlaceCard(GoldCard card, Coords coords) throws NoPossiblePlacement, NotPlaceableException
      This method is exposed to allow the placing (or not) of Gold card
      Parameters:
      card - is the GoldCard that will be placed if the coordinates chosen by the player are correct
      coords - this parameter contain the Coordinates chosen by the player to place the card
      Returns:
      the points given by the card placed
      Throws:
      NoPossiblePlacement
      NotPlaceableException

      Returns:

      public LinkedList<CardPlacedInfo> getOrderedField()
